Name: kushBans
Title: Good location
Review: The palace itself is not so much magnificent but it is well maintained from inside as well as outside.

Name: shobha agarwal
Title: Just a residential colony
Review: Nothing unique and no need to visit this place. It is just a residential colony of government officers wherein you will get to see huge bungalows of IAS officers.

Name: sshuklalko
Title: It's Government officers residential colony...
Review: It has nothing royal or regal only huge bungalows for IAS officers were there ,now they are constructing apartments inside colony so lots of dust and pollution .The only speciallity is AKANSHA Foods which provide  snakes items and grind masala .

Name: sujatapant
Title: Nothing regal about this palace
Review: This is now the property of the GOVT and houses the officers of the state GOVT . Nice open spaces , green area good for walks , and akanksha is here , which is a ngo run by women from the weaker section ,who prepare the most delicious snacks.

Name: indiatravel35
Title: historical place and now residential colony
Review: this place has historical significance, now resident colony inside this place ,was built by Spencer Harcourt Butler.

Name: Sajeed K
Title: Great Rajastani Architecture
Review: It is beautiful palace was used for the official residence of Sir Harcourt Butler. After independence, the Palace had been the academic centre (Library)  of the Indian Council of Philosophical Research (ICPR) until 2005 when the Council vacated the Palace following the Supreme Court order. Built in Rajasthani style, it is a four faceted  palace  and a rare object of architecture.There is a lake adjacent to the Palace which provides a magnificent look to the Palace. The Palace is  the property of to Raja of Mahmudabad, Mohammed Amir Mohammed Khan, hence you can see it from outside only.

Name: rchohan
Title: residential colony
Review: it is a residential colony near botanical gardens in Lucknow and houses the elite class of Lucknow . there is a small water body near the place but mainly residential area
